title: The defence of trade In a letter to Sir Thomas Smith Knight, gouernour of the East-India Companie, &c. From one of that societie.
author: Digges, Dudley, Sir, 1583-1639.
publisher: Printed by William Stansby for Iohn Barnes, and are to be sold at his shop ouer against Saint Sepulchres Church without Newgate,
notes: A partial reprint of and reply to: Kayll, Robert.  The trades increase.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
